name: Long-sleeved Cotton Top
desc: Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline and a small opening with a button at the back of the neck.

name: Jeggings
desc: CONSCIOUS CHOICE Jeggings in stretch denim made from a cotton blend with soft, adjustable elastication at the waist, a fake fly and fake front pockets.

name: Long-sleeved Cotton Top 2
desc: Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline and a small opening with a button at the back of the neck.

name: Legging Berbulu Dalam
desc: ADJUSTABLE WAIST Celana legging dari katun jersey organik tebal dengan bagian dalam berbulu lembut. Karet lembut yang dapat disesuaikan di pinggang agar pas dan nyaman di perut.

name: Cotton Flannel Shirt
desc: Shirt in soft cotton flannel with a collar, buttons down the front and open chest pockets. Gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves.

name: Denim Dungarees
desc: CONSCIOUS CHOICE Dungarees in washed denim. Adjustable straps with press-studs at the front, a press-stud at the sides and fake fly. Chest pocket, fake diagonal front pockets and real back pockets. Concealed press-studs at the crotch and along the legs (except in sizes 1-4Y).

name: 2-piece Set
desc: Comfortable set with a shirt in a cotton weave and a pair of joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric. Shirt with a collar, buttons down the front, a yoke at the back, a rounded hem and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Joggers with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist.

name: Lined Jeans
desc: LINED Jersey-lined jeans in soft, stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated, drawstring waist, fake fly and fake front pockets.

name: 2-pack Lined Joggers
desc: LINED Casual-style joggers in cotton twill with a soft jersey lining. Easy pull-on, elasticated, drawstring waist, a fake fly and fake side pockets.

name: Sleep Bag
desc: Padded sleep bag in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder and zip at one side. Jersey lining. The sleep bag is designed for indoor use only. Tog 2.0.

name: 3-pack T-shirts
desc: T-shirts in supersoft cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline and press-studs on one shoulder (except in sizes 2-4Y).

name: 2-potong Set
desc: ADJUSTABLE WAIST Setelan kaus dari katun jersey lembut dan celana jogger dari denim pudar berbahan campuran katun. Kaus dengan bahu turun dan kancing tekan di satu bahu (kecuali ukuran 2-4th). Jogger dengan karet pinggang yang dapat disesuaikan dan saku depan imitasi.

name: Wide Twill Trousers
desc: rousers in cotton twill with a high waist, zip fly and button, front and back pockets and wide, straight legs.

name: Oversized Printed T-shirt
desc: Oversized T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front. Ribbed trim around the neckline and low dropped shoulders.

name: Printed Sweatshirt
desc: Short top in sweatshirt fabric with a soft brushed inside and a print motif on the front. Round, rib-trimmed neckline, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

name: Oversized Blouse
desc: Oversized blouse in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Collar, buttons down the front and a double-layered yoke with a box pleat at the back. Gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Gently rounded hem.

name: Button-front Trousers
desc: CONSCIOUS CHOICE Trousers in heavy jersey. High waist with concealed elastication, decorative buttons at the front and wide, straight legs.

name: Fine-knit Jumper
desc: Short jumper in a soft fine knit with a round, rib-trimmed neckline, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

name: Collared Rib-knit Top
desc: Short, fitted top in a rib-knit viscose blend with a collar, V-shaped opening at the front and long sleeves.

name: Hole-knit Jumper
desc: Cropped jumper in a soft hole knit with a round neckline, low dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves. Ribbed trim around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

name: Jumper Rajut
desc: Jumper longgar dari rajutan lembut dengan garis leher bulat, bahu menurun, lengan panjang dan rib di sekeliling garis leher dan kelim.

name: Knitted Jumper
desc: Loose-fitting jumper in a soft knit with a round neckline, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline and hem.

name: Knitted Jumper
desc: Loose-fitting jumper in a soft knit with a round neckline, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline and hem.

name: Fine-knit Jumper
desc: Short jumper in a soft fine knit with a round, rib-trimmed neckline, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

name: Jumper
desc: Jumper in a soft knit with a round, rib-trimmed neckline. Relaxed fit with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

name: 5-pack Jersey T-shirts
desc: CONSCIOUS CHOICE Classic T-shirts in soft cotton jersey with a round, rib-trimmed neckline. Some with print motifs on the front.

name: 3-pack Long-sleeved Tops
desc: Long-sleeved tops in soft jersey with a round neckline. The cotton content of the tops is organic.

name: 5-pack Printed Jersey Tops
desc: Short-sleeved tops in soft cotton jersey with a print motif. Longer and rounded at the back.

name: 3-pack Long-sleeved Tops
desc: Long-sleeved tops in soft jersey with a round neckline. The cotton content of the tops is organic.

name: Printed T-shirt
desc: T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey.

name: Printed T-shirt
desc: T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey.

name: Printed T-shirt
desc: T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey.

name: Twill Overshirt
desc: Overshirt in twill with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets with a button, and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.

name: Twill Overshirt
desc: Overshirt in twill with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets with a button, and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.

name: Twill Overshirt
desc: Overshirt in twill with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets with a button, and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.

name: Loose Fit Sweatshirt
desc: Top in soft cotton jersey. Loose fit with a stand-up collar, zip at the top, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

name: Oversized Fit Overshirt
desc: Oversized overshirt in a soft weave with embroidered motifs. Turn-down collar, press-studs down the front and a yoke at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a sleeve placket. Rounded hem.

name: Oversized Fit Printed Hoodie
desc: Oversized hoodie in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a soft brushed inside and print motifs. Double-layered wrapover hood, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

name: Relaxed Fit Printed Hoodie
desc: Hoodie in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a print motif. Relaxed fit with a double-layered, drawstring hood, long sleeves, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

name: Regular Fit Hoodie
desc: Long-sleeved hoodie in soft sweatshirt fabric with a kangaroo pocket, double-layered drawstring hood with a wrapover front, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
